headline: Tilda Swinton's (Unsurprisingly) Sophisticated Tailoring: Look Of The Day
short descr: Fame WHO: "We Need To Talk About Kevin" star Tilda Swinton Shop a similar look below and check out more of our Look Of The
image_caption(s): Zara Boucle Knit Cardigan With Piping And Strass, $129
article: WHO: "We Need To Talk About Kevin" star Tilda Swinton WHAT: The stunning actress and occasional David Bowie doppleganger was the epitome of chic (shocker, we know) outside the Palace at Versailles, dressed in a long Chanel coat, tailored wide-leg pants, white button-down blouse and oversized shades. WHERE: The Chanel Cruise 2013 runway show at Versailles on May 14th. Shop a similar look below and check out more of our Look Of The Day picks.Want more? Be sure to check out Stylelist on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr and Pinterest.

headline: What a 100-Year-Old Has To Say About Today's Beauty And Fashion Trends (PHOTOS)
short descr: At 100 years old, Ruth is much more stylish and healthy than most women half her age. With an intense fitness routine and
image_caption(s): "Invest in quality pieces, they never go out of style."
article: At 100 years old, Ruth is much more stylish and healthy than most women half her age. With an intense fitness routine and a wardrobe made up of vintage scarves, costume jewelry and designer dresses, it's no wonder Stylelist Blogger Network member Ari Seth Cohen of Advanced Style tapped her as one of his muses. Ari's blog, which consists of street style snaps of the older set, is a reminder to us all that no matter your age, great style is about having a great attitude. Ruth was kind enough to share ten fashion and beauty tips with Ari, and we've selected our top five favorites in the slideshow below. Don't forget to visit Advanced Style to learn more about Ruth and other inspiring ladies (and gents!)Want more? Be sure to check out Stylelist on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr and Pinterest.
